price: 6. Wana ezali mikapo mia Allah tozali kotangela yo na bosoló. Liloba kani bakondimaka yango osima (koyoka mpe kozua liloba) ya Allah na bilembo bia ye?
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَايَٰتِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi fabi-ayyi ḥadīthin baʿda al-lahi waāyātihi yu'minūna
